species.name: kricketot
descriptions: It chats with others using the sounds of its colliding antennae. These sounds are fall hallmarks.
It shakes its head back to front, causing its antennae to hit each other and sound like a xylophone.
Its legs are short. Whenever it stumbles, its stiff antennae clack with a xylophone-like sound.
When its antennae hit each other, it sounds like the music of a xylophone.
When the trees take on new hues, more of these Pok√©mon appear. The tone they create by striking their antennae together resembles that of the marimba, an instrument of foreign lands.

abilities.name: shed-skin
abilities.effect: Has a 33% chance of curing any major status ailment after each turn.

abilities.name: run-away
abilities.effect: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.
